net.title: Network connection not available
net.desc: Check that airplane mode is disabled and you're connected to a local network.

warn.title: Warning!
warn.desc:
USB installations may not "just werk" on some devices and setups.
If you experience issues with USB installations, please don't pull your
hair out! It's advised to use NS-USBloader for USB installations, or
LAN/Internet installations instead for remote installation, especially
when paired with an ethernet adapter!

You have been warned...

error.title: No USB connection detected
error.desc: Plug in to a compatible device to install over USB

applet.title: Applet Mode not supported
applet.desc:
You may experience issues using AtmoXL-Titel-Installer in Applet Mode. If you do
have problems, please switch to running AtmoXL-Titel-Installer over an installed
title (hold R while starting a game)!

help.title: Help
help.desc:
Files can be installed remotely from your other devices using tools such
as NS-USBloader in Tinfoil mode. To send files to your Switch, open one
of these pieces of software on your PC or mobile device, input your
Switch's IP address (listed on-screen), select your files, then upload
to your console! If the software you're using won't let you select
specific file types, try renaming the extension to something it accepts.
AtmoXL-Titel-Installer doesn't care about file extensions during net installations!

If you can't figure it out, just copy your files to your SD card and try
the "Install from SD Card" option on the main menu!

src.title: Where do you want to install from?

url.hint: Enter the Internet address of a file

gdrive.hint: Enter the file ID of a public Google Drive file

net.top_info: Select what files you want to install from the server, then press the Plus button!
net.top_info1: Waiting for a connection... Your Switch's IP Address is:
net.index_error_info: Ensure that the URL points to a valid web directory index or Tinfoil style JSON.
net.transfer_interput: An error occured during data transfer. Check your network connection.

help.title: Help
help.desc:
Copy your NSP, NSZ, XCI, or XCZ files to your SD card, browse to and
select the ones you want to install, then press the Plus button.

sd.top_info: Select what files you want to install from SD card, then press the Plus button!
sd.delete_info: installed! Delete it from the SD card?
sd.delete_info_multi: files installed successfully! Delete them from the SD card?
sd.delete_desc: The original files aren't needed anymore after they've been installed
sd.buttons:  Select File     Select All     Install File(s)     Hide Installed     Cancel
sd.buttons_show:  Select File     Select All     Install File(s)     Show Installed     Cancel

help.title: Help
help.desc:
Files can be installed over USB from other devices using tools such as
NS-USBloader in Tinfoil mode. To send files to your Switch, open one of
these pieces of software on your PC, select your files, then upload to
your console!

Unfortunately USB installations require a specific setup on some
platforms, and can be rather buggy at times. If you can't figure it out,
give LAN/internet installs a try, or copy your files to your SD card and
try the "Install from SD Card" option on the main menu!

usb.top_info: USB connection successful! Waiting for list of files to be sent...
usb.top_info2: Select what files you want to install over USB, then press the Plus button!
usb.error: USB transfer timed out or failed
usb.buttons2:  Select File     Select All     Install File(s)     Cancel

help.title: Help
help.desc:
Copy your NSP, NSZ, XCI, or XCZ files to your USB HDD, browse to and
select the ones you want to install, then press the Plus button.

hdd.top_info: Select what files you want to install from USB HDD, then press the Plus button!

hdd.delete_info_multi: files installed successfully! Delete them from the USB HDD?
hdd.delete_desc: The original files aren't needed anymore after they've been installed

info_page.failed_desc: Partially installed contents can be removed from the System Settings applet.

nca_verify.title: Invalid NCA signature detected!
nca_verify.desc:
Improperly signed software should only be installed from trustworthy
sources. Files containing cartridge repacks and DLC unlockers will always
show this warning. You can disable this check in AtmoXL-Titel-Installer's settings.

Are you sure you want to continue the installation?
nca_verify.error: The requested NCA is not properly signed:

finished: I'm sure after you give the game a try you'll have tons of fun actually buying it!
You buy gamu right? Nintendo-san thanka-you for your purchase!
Bypassing DRM is great, isn't it?
You probably saved like six trees by not buying the game! All that plastic goes somewhere!
Nintendo ninjas have been dispatched to your current location.
And we didn't even have to shove a political ideology down your throat to get here!

menu_items.ignore_firm: Ignore minimum firmware version required by titles
menu_items.ask_delete: Ask to delete original files after installation
menu_items.enableLightning: Info lights flash at the end
menu_items.auto_update: Check for updates to AtmoXL-Titel-Installer automatically

nca_warn.title: Warning!
nca_warn.desc:
Some installable files may contain malicious contents! Only disable this
feature if you are absolutely certain the software you will be installing
is trustworthy!

Do you still want to disable NCA signature verification?
